ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Smithing...
ygData.msgSnippet: Gnomes will get cultural armor, but it can t be implemented until the tinkering patch goes in.  Whether enchanters can wear it or not, your guess is as good as
ygData.messageBody:
Gnomes will get cultural armor, but it can't be implemented until the
tinkering patch goes in. Whether enchanters can wear it or not, your guess
is as good as mine. *shrug* But, if you got the extra cash, I don't see any
reason why not :)

Tinik Gutenungrie
Gnomish Enchanter, Veeshan

-----Original Message-----
From: Rich Hitz [mailto:Rich.Hitz@...]On Behalf Of (Uthanatos)
Sent: Monday, October 02, 2000 4:19 PM
To: '(EQ Enchanters)'
Subject: [eqenchanters] Smithing...


I have a question for you all...
As a gnome chanter, will it be worth while to become a smith? Do gnomes even
have (or is it planned) culrural armor coming out in another patch? I would
be very willing to start smithing if my chanter could wear chain.
I guess my next question would be how much plat does it take to get up to
Master Smith? To 200 form 100?

Thanks.

--
Uthanatos
The Lost Gnome of Norrath
Rare spawn on Fennin
